QuestData.Title: Monkey Mischief
QuestData.Description: Strange tales have reached our ears from Sri-La Village.$B$BIt seems that a hozen tribe has made itself comfortable in Oona Kagu, a cave along the coast south of the fishing village.$B$BToo comfortable, in fact. The tribe members are stealing and pillaging resources all along the coast.$B$BWe must teach them a lesson... one that can only be taught by force. They have already overstayed their welcome.
